extendedInfo.description: CoventryÂ® Mobile connects you to your health and benefits information when youâre on the go. Check status and view details of your claims. View your deductible and other benefit usage details. Access your member ID card at the doctorâs office, and email or fax a copy right from your mobile device. Search for doctors, hospitals, urgent care centers and pharmacies in our network. Also track details about your health, medications and so much more. Be sure to check back for new features!FEATURESMEMBER ID CARDForgot your member ID card at home? No problem. You can view, email or fax both sides of your member ID card to your health care provider. You can also view an authorized dependentâs member ID card and benefit usage details. MY HEALTH RECORDKeep all your health information in one place. View, update and share any of it with your health care team. You can fax or email: â¢	Current medicinesâ¢	Allergy and immunizations informationâ¢	Surgery and procedure historyâ¢	Family historyâ¢	Emergency contactsCLAIMSCheck the status of your medical and pharmacy claims. View a detailed claims summary. BENEFIT USAGEView your current balances (if applicable) and amount remaining for: â¢	Deductibles â¢	Out-of-pocket maximumsâ¢	HRA/FSA account MY RX CHOICES Log in to view your medication history. Browse by condition. Check for possible drug interactions. Verify price when your doctor prescribes a new drug to you for the first time. Taking a maintenance medication? Look for a lower-cost alternative. HEALTH & WELLNESSSearch for common health symptoms and conditions. View information that helps you seek treatment that may work for you. FIND A PROVIDER / PHARMACYNo need to register to use this feature. Follow a few steps to search for a doctor, hospital or urgent care center in our network. Have pharmacy benefits through Express Scripts? Find a convenient place to fill your prescriptions close to home. You can use GPS on your mobile device or enter a ZIP code and distance to narrow your search. Log in for more refined results. Search information includes:â¢	Name and genderâ¢	Specialty and hospital affiliationâ¢	Addressâ¢	Phone number with direct dial accessâ¢	Maps with driving directionsâ¢	Language(s)SETTINGSManage your document delivery and communication preferences. Choose between email or paper, depending on whatâs convenient for you. Note: Not all app features are available for every plan member. REGISTRATIONYour personal health information is available on the app only with a valid login. Register from your mobile device or visit My Online Services from a computer at https://member.cvty.com. You only need to register once to use these tools. If you are a first-time user of Coventry Mobile but already registered for My Online Services, you do not need to register again.SECURITY You must log in with your username and password. Please do not share your login information with anyone. You are in charge of your account. If you are the member/subscriber/primary account holder, you can access My Online Services account information for yourself or a covered dependent. You must use the correct username and password. If you are a covered dependent, be sure you have the account holderâs permission to access your account.TROUBLESHOOTING If you have trouble logging in, please make sure your login information is correct. You can also select Need help? from the main menu. Help is available M-F between 8 a.m. and 6 p.m. Eastern Time. If you are not in the U.S., email us at netsupport2@cvty.com. For questions about your benefits, please call Customer Service at the number on your member ID card. REQUIREMENTSCompatible with Android smartphones with OS 2.2 and later, and Android tablets with OS 3.0 and later.ABOUT COVENTRY HEALTH CARE Coventry Mobile is backed by Coventry Health Care, an Aetna company. Learn more at www.coventryhealthcare.com and www.aetna.com.

reviews.title: Not a real native app...
reviews.comment: I dislike web apps that masquerade as native apps.
reviews.author: Jared McGuire

reviews.title: Super slow and little use
reviews.comment: The always-accessible member card is the only real benefit.  I downloaded this so I\'d be able to see my HSA balance, but there\'s no link/access to that.  The doctor/facility directory would be helpful, except the app runs super slow, making me wonder how helpful this will be in a medical emergency.  It\'s also not intuitive.  If I want to know the closest hospitals, I have to click 10 times just to get to the hospital list, which is under \"Specialty\", not \"Name\".  This is backwards.  The first choice should be by proximity.  Also, since I\'m logged in, the plan type should already be saved in the system, instead of making me figure out what plan I\'m on.
reviews.author: Tammy Blackburn

reviews.title: Was convenient until Update!
reviews.comment: Loved this app, gave it 4 stars originally,  but now I can\'t even log in.  There\'s no point in having this app if I can\'t use it.  Will delete soon if I cannot use it.  Samsung Galaxy 3
reviews.author: Danielle Rechterman

reviews.title: Just updated
reviews.comment: Just updated and had to clear data for it to be usable.
reviews.author: Donnie Smith

reviews.title: Can\'t log in
reviews.comment: Text does not work
reviews.author: Stephen Gilbert

reviews.title: seems pointless
reviews.comment: can\'t check my claims, can\'t check my FSA, come on coventry you\'re gonna have to do better than this, and crashes to often Galaxy II
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Meh.
reviews.comment: It\'s nice to have an extra card, I guess.  Gets more sluggish every time I open it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good basic info
reviews.comment: Shame I have to restart my phone after each access.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just ok
reviews.comment: It\'s nice to have my card right there, but I cannot update information, or do much else. There is also no option to exit the app. I would like to see functionality like provider look-up and deductible usage so I can keep track of my spending.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its ok
reviews.comment: The app is ok but could have A LOT more functionality to it. I.understand its a mobile app but has nothing compared to the site. Add deductible info, provider lookup, maybe a wellness section like the site maybe?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: Love the app. I would like to see WellBeing integrated into it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy ID card access
reviews.comment: Nice to have access to my card and allergy information
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: Sees like a useful app. The only problem, i cant come out of it without pressing the home button.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Coventry app
reviews.comment: Excellent!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One less thing in my wallet
reviews.comment: Love that I can access my id card anytime.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: nice
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Cannot log in. It keeps saying username and password cannot be verified. Uninstall
reviews.author: Kevin in Omaha

reviews.title: slow and empty
reviews.comment: As others have said, the app is slow. I was able to display my card, but none of my health history would display.  It appears to be some sort of browser front end. It did not disrupt my phone like it did for others, but i installed it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work
reviews.comment: I can\'t look up the coverage of prescriptions.  It goes to a blank screen (after way too many clicks) and never comes back.
reviews.author: Marie C.

reviews.title: User
reviews.comment: Good upgrades to app.
reviews.author: mani k
